'''1.7.10-pre2''' is the second pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.7.10]], released on June 4, 2014,<ref>{{tweet|SeargeDP|474128525818339328|We just published a small update for the 1.7.10 pre-release (pre2)|June 4, 2014}}</ref> which fixes some minor bugs and a crash in [[1.7.10-pre1]] related to being kicked from a server.

1.7.10-pre2 was reuploaded shortly after release to fix the version number still saying "1.7.10-pre1".<ref>{{tweet|mitko1239|474133045566779392|@SeargeDP pre2 says pre1 in-game|4 Jun 14}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|prefix=Minecraft|fixedin=1.7.10-pre2|otherissuescount=1}}
* Fixed a crash related to being kicked from a server.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* This version came out exactly six years before [[Java Edition 1.16 Pre-release 1|1.16 Pre-release 1]].
